welcome_messages.main: Hi! I'm Jon's AI assistant. Ask me about his experience, projects, or fit for your company ‚Äî or explore the cards below.

case_study.title: Case Study

company_fit.title: Company fit

about_jon.title: About Jon
about_jon.description: A quick snapshot of who I am and what I do.

about_jon.title: Senior Product Designer & UX Engineer
description: I bridge the gap between technical complexity and human experience. With 10+ years in UX, I've delivered scalable digital products and strategies for ZARA, Gestamp, startups, and public institutions.
I believe in execution over buzzwords‚Äîbetter done than cheap talk. That's why I even built my own AI-powered chat assistant, proving how design and technology can work seamlessly together.

search_help.title: How to get the best answers
tips: Ask specific questions about industries (e.g., 'SaaS experience', 'healthcare projects')
Ask about company types (e.g., 'startup experience', 'enterprise work')
Request project details (e.g., 'Evcharge case study', 'ZARA project')
examples: What experience does Jon have in cybersecurity?
How does Jon work with agile teams?
Tell me about Jon's design system experience
What projects has Jon done in healthcare?

error_messages.no_results: I couldn't find specific information about that. Try rephrasing your question or ask about Jon's experience in specific industries like SaaS, healthcare, or automotive.
error_messages.search_failed: Sorry, there was an error processing your request. Please try again or ask about a different topic.
error_messages.project_not_found: I don't have detailed information about that specific project, but I can tell you about similar projects in that industry.
